Hello, I'm Lester!

I am a Junior Computer Science student at the Polytechnic University of the Philippines, passionate about web development. I aspire to become a full-stack web developer after graduation. I am continuously seeking opportunities to grow and expand my knowledge in this field, aiming to apply them in future endeavors.
